definition-item.definition-title: INDEXING SCHEME ASSOCIATED WITH SUBCLASSES F21K, F21L, F21S and F21V, RELATING TO THE FORM OR THE KIND OF THE LIGHT SOURCES OR OF THE COLOUR OF THE LIGHT EMITTED
annular; polygonal other than square or rectangular, e.g. for spotlights or for generating an axially symmetrical light beam

section-body.paragraph-text: Planar two-dimensional arrangements of point-like light-generating elements having an outside perimeter shape other than square or rectangular, including but not limited to: circular, elliptical, triangular, pentagonal, and the like.
